column1: If nothing else motivates our mega-church pastors to TAKE A STAND ,maybe this will:If you dont get back to in-person worship ASAP, revenue will decrease to BARE BONES meaning NO 100th trip to Israel or 50th cruise to Alaska #lockdown #coronavirus #COVID19 #newsom #9thCircuit
